alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 5:00AM CDT until April 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and near-blizzard conditions expected. Additional accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dawes, Box Butte, and Sioux County. In Wyoming, Goshen and Niobrara County. This includes Chadron, Lusk, Harrison, Alliance, and Torrington. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
